description: Enable a user SSH public key for login via NETCONF using OpenConfig models

username.description: Local user account to which the SSH key will be added

public_key.description: SSH public key string (e.g. 'ssh-rsa AAAAB3... user@host')

key_name.description: Optional name/label for the key on the device

commit.description: Whether to commit the candidate datastore after edit (only relevant when target='candidate')

redact_patterns.description: Additional patterns to redact from logs/outputs
